django.contrib.flatpages.views
==============================

.. py:module:: django.contrib.flatpages.views


Attributes
----------

.. autoapisummary::

   django.contrib.flatpages.views.DEFAULT_TEMPLATE


Functions
---------

.. autoapisummary::

   django.contrib.flatpages.views.flatpage
   django.contrib.flatpages.views.render_flatpage


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:data:: DEFAULT_TEMPLATE
   :value: 'flatpages/default.html'


.. py:function:: flatpage(request, url)

   Public interface to the flat page view.

   Models: `flatpages.flatpages`
   Templates: Uses the template defined by the ``template_name`` field,
       or :template:`flatpages/default.html` if template_name is not defined.
   Context:
       flatpage
           `flatpages.flatpages` object


.. py:function:: render_flatpage(request, f)

   Internal interface to the flat page view.
